timeline.message: check the Python path and fail early

timeline.bodyText:
stderr maybe?

  
    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            		echo "Not a directory: $PYTHON_PATH"

timeline.author: idodeclare
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -30,8 +30,13 @@ if [[ "$TRAVIS_OS_NAME" == "windows" ]]; then
 	export PATH=${PATH}:/c/Program\ Files\ \(x86\)/Subversion/bin
 	export PATH=${PATH}:${JAVA_HOME}
 
+	PYTHON_PATH="/c/Python39"
+	if [[ ! -d $PYTHON_PATH ]]; then
+		echo "Not a directory: $PYTHON_PATH"

timeline.message:
print error message to stderr
